settings.title: WOOD FIRED TASTE
settings.text: Fremont can be filled with falvored pellets or wood chips to create a rich smoky flavor pizza.

settings.title: HEAVY DUTY STAINLESS STEEL
settings.text: Made of high quality food grade stainless steel, provides long-lasting durability and great heat retention.

settings.title: MULTIPURPOSE COOKER
settings.text: Along with this pizza oven, you can enjoy more cooking recipes to make pizza, steak, lobster, lamb chops and so much more by buying our extra BBQ accessories.

settings.author: Lilah Ioselev
settings.comment: This product is very good and very convenient to use. Family and friends like it. Will continue to buy back.

settings.author: Aryn Jacobssen
settings.comment: This product is very good and very convenient to use. Family and friends like it. Will continue to buy back.

settings.author: (Wayfair) - Bruce
settings.comment: It does come with hose and regulator,in spec it said no.Works great,easy clean up,it cooks from the top so food doesn’t stick to pan and get baked on.
